Makers of goods. Advocates of better.

We make everyday goods essential to life. Yet what makes us different is our passion for removing barriers to opportunity.

See the goods we make. Explore the better we do.

Criminal Justice Reform

Throughout his life, Koch’s lead attorney, Mark Holden, has seen the devastating results of overcriminalization on the lives of others. Now he’s helping lead a broad coalition from across the political spectrum to do something about it. Read full story.

Quenching A Thirsty Planet

Two-thirds of our globe is covered with water. Yet people in communities all over the world still profoundly suffer from lack of clean drinking water. Meet Manny Singh, one of our scientists who innovates new and better ways to solve this crisis. Read full story.

Growing More, Naturally

At Koch Agronomic Services, scientists like John Kruse research promising new ways to stimulate plant performance and crop yield using microbes found naturally in the soil itself. Read full story.

Home

Page Title

Food. Shelter. Clothing. Transportation. Koch Industries creates life’s basic necessities, while innovating ways to make them even better. Yet our advocacy for a free and open society is what truly sets us apart.
